topic.title: EMS Social History Section - conformance rules

lines.i: Information about the patient's social environment

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.22"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10241)/@code="67843-3" EMS social history Narrative NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10240)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title and SHOULD equal "EMS Social History" (CONF:10243)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry (CONF:10965)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Existence Of Drug Use Indication (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.70)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [0..*] entry (CONF:10967)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Drug Use Indication (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.71)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10241)/@code="67843-3" EMS social history Narrative NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10240)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title and SHOULD equal "EMS Social History" (CONF:10243)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry (CONF:10965)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Existence Of Drug Use Indication (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.70)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [0..*] entry (CONF:10967)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Drug Use Indication (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.71)
